Articles.Content:
I have been desperately wanting a life support mod for my KSP career game, as right now I can send a Kerbal to the Mun and leave him there to learn everything about the place, like a space-hermit of some kind. This feels really phony and I need some sort of motivation to limit how much time the Kerbal can stay on the Mun. I've tried some of the mods, but the ones I have tried don't support .22 and make exploration nearly impossible. So, any life support mods that have proper support for .22? Are there any WIP?

Edited November 11, 2013 by Sapphire Snow Leopard

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40667-0-21-1-WIP-TAC-Life-Support-28Jul

No recyclers yet so it's actually meaningful and it tracks multiple resources.
